CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video analysis template to perform intelligent categorization.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template for a video analysis task

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video analysis template to perform intelligent categorization and labeling.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template for multiple analysis tasks

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video analysis template to perform all intelligent analysis tasks.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template to perform all content analysis tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a speech translation template.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mps.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAIRecognitionTemplate
<Common request parameters>



{
    "Name": "test"
}
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a Speech Translation Template

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video recognition template with face recognition enabled. The default face library is used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mps.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAIRecognitionTemplate
<Common request parameters>



{
    "Comment": "Template 2",
    "FaceConfigure": {
        "Switch": "ON",
        "Score": "90",
        "FaceLibrary": "Default"
    },
    "Name": "Intelligent Identification Template"
}
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a Template for Multiple Video Recognition Tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video recognition template with face recognition enabled. The default and custom face libraries are used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a Template for Multiple Video Recognition Tasks, with the Frame Capturing Interval Specified

CreateAdaptiveDynamicStreamingTemplate.title: Creating an Adaptive Bitrate Streaming Template

CreateAnimatedGraphicsTemplate.title: Creating an animated image generating template

}

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom AI content moderation template to detect pornographic, terrorist, and politically sensitive content in images using the default thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition, without specifying a filter tag.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a Content Moderation Template to Perform Multiple Moderation Tasks

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom AI content moderation template to detect pornographic content in images using the default thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition, without specifying a filter tag.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a Content Moderation Template to Detect Pornographic Content

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom AI content moderation template to detect pornographic content in images using the default thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition, with the tags specified as `porn` and `sexy`.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a Content Moderation Template to Detect Pornographic Content with Specified Tags

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom AI content moderation template to detect pornographic content in images, with the thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition set to 80 and 30, respectively.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a Content Moderation Template to Detect Pornographic Content, and Specifying the Threshold and Frame Interception Interval

CreateSchedule.document: This example shows you how to create a scheme for the bucket "evan-test-1300828900". It will be triggered whenever an MP4 or FLV file is uploaded to the bucket's `/input/` directory. After it is triggered, a transcoding task (template ID 10) will be executed multiple times.
CreateSchedule.title: Configuring a transcoding rule

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mps.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscodeTemplate
<Common request parameters>



{
    "RemoveVideo": 0,
    "Container": "mp4",
    "Name": "test",
    "AudioTemplate": {
        "SampleRate": 44100,
        "Codec": "aac",
        "Bitrate": 200
    },
    "VideoTemplate": {
        "Codec": "h264",
        "Bitrate": 256,
        "Fps": 45
    },
    "RemoveAudio": 0
}
CreateTranscodeTemplate.title: Creating a Transcoding Template

CreateWordSamples.document: If `Usages` is `All`, the keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a Keyword Sample - `All`

CreateWordSamples.document: If `Usages` is `Review`, the keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a Keyword Sample - `Review`

CreateWordSamples.document: If `Usages` is ["Recognition.Ocr","Review.Ocr"], the keyword can be used for OCR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a Keyword Sample - `Recognition`

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a transcoding rule named "trans-100020-100030-100040" to process the content in the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket according to the transcoding templates 100020, 100030, and 100040.
CreateWorkflow.title: Setting a transcoding rule

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a screenshot rule named "snapshot" to process the content in the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket according to the screenshot template 100010.

DescribeTasks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1

EditMedia.title: [Editing Task] Editing a File to Generate a New Video

EditMedia.document: This example shows you how to concatenate a set of images and background music into a video and add a transition effect between images. The track form is as follows: Effect Example Note: A transition consumes the track duration of the elements before and after it. If there are transitions before and after an element, you need to ensure that the track duration of the element is greater than the sum of the duration of the transitions before and after it.
EditMedia.title: [Compositing Task] Compositing Images and Audio into a Video

EditMedia.document: This example shows you how to edit a video and add opening and closing scenes, watermark images, captions, and replacement audio to create a new video. The track form is as follows: Effect Example Note: The opening and closing scenes can be either videos or images.Note: The Canvas parameter is used to specify the output video size. If left blank, it is the size of the first video by default. Therefore, it is recommended to place the genuine video in the first place on the material list.
EditMedia.title: [Compositing Task] Editing & Opening Scene & Closing Scene & Watermark Images & Text & Audio Replacement

EditMedia.document: This example shows you how to scale one video and overlay it onto another video to create a new video. The track form is as follows: Effect Example
EditMedia.title: [Compositing Task] Picture-in-Picture

EditMedia.document: This example shows you how to edit a video to create a new video, so that it can be played at 2x speed for the first 10 seconds and at 0.8x speed for the last 10 seconds. The track form is as follows:Effect ExampleNote: When the material duration in SourceMedia is different from TrackTime, the effect of adjusting playback speed can be achieved.Note: The effect of adjusting playback speed cannot be used simultaneously with the transition effect.
EditMedia.title: [Compositing Task] Adjusting Video Playback Speed

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom AI content moderation template to enable porn detection. The default thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition are used, and no tags are specified.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying a Content Moderation Template to Enable Porn Detection

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom AI content moderation template to enable porn detection. The thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition are set to 90 and 60, respectively, and the tag is specified as `sexy`.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying a Content Moderation Template to Enable Porn Detection with Specified Thresholds and Tags

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom AI content moderation template to enable porn detection. The thresholds for rule violation and manual recognition are set to 90 and 60, respectively, and no tags are specified.
